title: Pink Skies

description.plain:
“Pink Skies” is the opening track of Zach Bryan’s new album “The Great American Bar Scene”. The Great American Bar Scene is Bryan’s fourth studio album and was fully released On May 24, 2024.

Zach gets personal, talking about someone’s death, and it’s believed to be his mother, and describing what happened at her unfortunate funeral.

In the song’s Chorus, Zach is talking to someone who has passed and is believed to be his mother. She passed away on August 3, 2016, at the age of 49. Annette was a Certified Nursing Assistant which allowed her to care for many people.

https://www.lehmanfuneralhome.net/obituary/Annette-Bryan

Annette DeAnn’s Obituary.

Zach and His Mother were very close, and he previously mentioned her on multiple different songs, for example:

Sweet DeAnn –
Sweet DeAnn was released on August 24, 2019, and it’s the closing track for Bryan’s 2nd studio album, “DeAnn”.

And:

She’s Alright – She’s Alright released on May 20, 2020, and it’s the 11th track of Bryan’s 3rd studio album, “American Heartbreak”.

Plus a few others.

Pink Skies is an all-out emotional song, becoming a heavy hitter on the emotional side.



Cover Art for Bryan’s 2nd studio album, “DeAnn”.

embed_content: Read “Pink Skies” by Zach Bryan on Genius

“Pink Skies” is the opening track of Zach Bryan’s new album “The Great American Bar Scene”. The Great American Bar Scene is Bryan’s fourth studio album and was fully released On May 24, 2024.

Zach gets personal, talking about someone’s death, and it’s believed to be his mother, and describing what happened at her unfortunate funeral.

In the song’s Chorus, Zach is talking to someone who has passed and is believed to be his mother. She passed away on August 3, 2016, at the age of 49. Annette was a Certified Nursing Assistant which allowed her to care for many people.

https://www.lehmanfuneralhome.net/obituary/Annette-Bryan

Annette DeAnn’s Obituary.

Zach and His Mother were very close, and he previously mentioned her on multiple different songs, for example:

Sweet DeAnn –
Sweet DeAnn was released on August 24, 2019, and it’s the closing track for Bryan’s 2nd studio album, “DeAnn”.

And:

Plus a few others.

lyrics:
29 ContributorsTranslationsPolskiEspañolDeutschPink Skies Lyrics
The kids are in town for a funeral
So pack the car and dry your eyes
I know they got plenty of young blood left in 'em
And plenty nights under pink skies you taught 'em to enjoy

So clean the house, clear the drawers, mop the floors, stand tall
Like no one's ever been here before or at all
And don't you mention all the inches that are scraped on the doorframe
We all know you tiptoed up to 4'1" back in '08

If you could see 'em now, you'd be proud
But you'd think they's yuppiеs
Your funeral was beautiful
I bet God hеard you comin'

The kids are in town for a funeral
And the grass all smells the same as the day you broke your arm swingin'
On that kid out on the river
You bailed him out, never said a thing about Jesus or the way he's livin'

If you could see 'em now, you'd be proud
But you'd think they's yuppies
Your funeral was beautiful
I bet God heard you comin'

(Strum it)

If you could see 'em now, you'd be proud
But you'd think they's yuppies
Your funeral was beautiful
I bet God heard you comin'

The kids are in town for a funeral
So pack the car and dry your eyes
I know they got plenty of young blood left in 'em
And plenty nights under pink skies you taught 'em to enjoy
